name: PALADINK
description:
A game (our first game) made for the Game Creation Organization Online Jam.

It's a crawler based little game coded and designed with all our love.

We are two people and this project was confusing because we had some scary errors D: but we finally solved almost all of them. :")

Known Bugs:

-When using a laptop pad instead of a common mouse the bullet doesn't fire.

-Bullet collision with walls aren't adjusted.
